SELECT APP_DOC_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO APP_DOC_T (DOC_ID, EMP_ID, TITLE, DOC_TEMP_CODE, WRITE_DT, UPDATE_DT, DEP_ID, DOC_STATE, URGENT) VALUES (#{docId}, #{empId}, #{title}, #{docTempCode}, TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{depId}, #{docState}, #{urgent})

SELECT DOC_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO DOC_T (DOCS_ID, DOC_ID,REMARKS, OTHER) VALUES (#{docsId}, #{docId}, #{remarks}, #{other})

SELECT DOC_ITEM_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO DOC_ITEM_T (ITEM_ID, DOC_ID, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_STANDARD, ITEM_QUAN, ITEM_COST, AMOUNT) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{docId}, #{itemName}, #{itemStandard}, #{itemQuan}, #{itemCost}, #{amount})

SELECT APPROVAL_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO APPROVAL_T (APP_ID, DOC_ID, DRAFTER, APPROVER) VALUES (#{appId}, #{docId}, #{drafter}, #{approver})
mapper.select: SELECT AD.WRITE_DT AS writeDt, AD.DOC_ID AS docId, APP.APP_DT AS appDt, AD.DOC_TEMP_CODE AS docTempCode, AD.URGENT AS urgent, AD.TITLE AS title, AD.DOC_STATE AS docState, U.NAME AS userName, DEP.NAME AS depName, U.DEP_ID AS depId, APP.APP_DOC_ID AS appDocId, APP.APP_STATE AS appState FROM APP_DOC_T AD JOIN USER_T U ON AD.EMP_ID = U.EMP_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT_T DEP ON U.DEP_ID = DEP.CODE LEFT JOIN APPROVAL_T APP ON AD.DOC_ID = APP.DOC_ID WHERE AD.EMP_ID = #{empId} ORDER BY AD.WRITE_DT DESC

SELECT DOC.WRITE_DT AS writeDt, APP.APP_DT AS appDt, DOC.DOC_TEMP_CODE AS docTempCode, DOC.URGENT AS urgent, DOC.TITLE AS title, DOC.DOC_STATE AS docState, U.NAME AS userName, DEP.NAME AS depName, U.DEP_ID AS depId, APP.APP_DOC_ID AS appDocId, APP.APP_STATE AS appState FROM APP_DOC_T DOC JOIN USER_T U ON DOC.EMP_ID = U.EMP_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT_T DEP ON U.DEP_ID = DEP.CODE LEFT JOIN APPROVAL_T APP ON DOC.DOC_ID = APP.DOC_ID WHERE DOC.EMP_ID = #{empId} AND DOC.DOC_STATE = #{docState} ORDER BY DOC.WRITE_DT DESC

SELECT DOC.WRITE_DT AS writeDt, APP.APP_DT AS appDt, DOC.DOC_TEMP_CODE AS docTempCode, DOC.URGENT AS urgent, DOC.TITLE AS title, DOC.DOC_STATE AS docState, U.NAME AS userName, DEP.NAME AS depName, U.DEP_ID AS depId, APP.APP_DOC_ID AS appDocId, APP.APP_STATE AS appState FROM APP_DOC_T DOC JOIN USER_T U ON DOC.EMP_ID = U.EMP_ID JOIN DEPARTMENT_T DEP ON U.DEP_ID = DEP.CODE LEFT JOIN APPROVAL_T APP ON DOC.DOC_ID = APP.DOC_ID WHERE DOC.DEP_ID = #{depId} AND DOC.DOC_STATE = #{docState} ORDER BY DOC.WRITE_DT DESC

SELECT AD.DOC_ID AS docId, AD.EMP_ID AS empId, AD.TITLE AS title, AD.DOC_TEMP_CODE AS docTempCode, AD.WRITE_DT AS writeDt, AD.UPDATE_DT AS updateDt, AD.DEP_ID AS depId, AD.DOC_STATE AS docState, AD.URGENT AS urgent, A.APP_ID AS appId, A.APP_STATE AS appState, A.SUBMIT_DT AS submitDt, A.APP_DT AS appDt, A.APP_DOC_ID AS appDocId, A.REJECT AS reject, A.LINE_ORDER AS lineOrder FROM APP_DOC_T AD LEFT JOIN APPROVAL_T A ON AD.DOC_ID = A.DOC_ID; WHERE AD.DOC_ID = #{docId} ORDER BY DOC.WRITE_DT DESC

SELECT I.ITEM_ID AS itemId, APP.DOC_ID AS docId, I.ITEM_NAME AS itemName, I.ITEM_STANDARD AS itemStandard, I.ITEM_QUAN AS itemQuan, I.ITEM_COST AS itemCost, I.AMOUNT AS amount, DOC.REMARKS AS remarks, DOC.OTHER AS other, APP.EMP_ID AS empId, APP.TITLE AS title, APP.DEP_ID AS depId, APPROVAL.DRAFTER AS drafter, APPROVAL.APPROVER AS approver, APPROVAL.SUBMIT_DT AS submitDt, APPROVAL.APP_DT AS appDt, APPROVAL.APP_DOC_ID AS appDocId, APPROVAL.REJECT AS reject
FROM APP_DOC_T APP LEFT JOIN DOC_T DOC ON APP.DOC_ID = DOC.DOC_ID LEFT JOIN DOC_ITEM_T I ON APP.DOC_ID = I.DOC_ID LEFT JOIN APPROVAL_T APPROVAL ON APP.DOC_ID = APPROVAL.APP_DOC_ID WHERE APP.DOC_ID = #{docId};
